website_summaries.verdict: This rich, day-to-night cream enhances skin's appearance by supporting it's natural structure and collagen. It's perfect for for anyone who wants a versatile cream without harsh ingredients.
pros: A versatile cream with polypeptides that can be used day and night, and is suitable for all skin types
Makes skin feel soft and smooth, and gives it a "plump" appearance
A little goes a long way
cons: Rare reports of breakouts developing after using it
May not provide a total moisturizing results for extremely dry skin
As a day cream it doesn't provide sun protection

customer_reviews.title: Different than sephora version
customer_reviews.text: Been using this cream for a few weeks now and have seen no results. Used a sample size of the sephora version, and saw overnight results, and noticed that the consistency is different than the one I purchased on amazon. I think the packaging is the same, but the contents are different. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: p.c.

customer_reviews.title: Inauthentic! Buy at Sephora or through the brand website!
customer_reviews.text: I will go into the Sephora store to purchase from now on. Second time using product and never had this issue. This container was tampered with and I believe so because I simply picked it up and the bottom position containing the lotion fell right off and spilt all over the floor. I had scooped most of up but now am left with 3/4 of what I paid for. I never broke out the first time I bought this product and now the second time I have small whiteheads. Something seems off and I’m very disappointed I waited so long for what wasn’t the real deal! Inauthentic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving quantity
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging is absolutely deceiving. Loved the lotion itself but we disgusted when I found out that the bottle is actually 1/4 lotion 3/4 air. Very disappointed. Will not be purchasing again. Not worth the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Great for older post menopausal dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this since March 2018 My skin looks awesome not flaky or dry anymore
customer_reviews.author: Gina53

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of a gel moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is a god send. I love how fast it is absorbed and doesn’t leave a greasy after film. I use Caudelie brightening serum immediately after cleansing. Then a pea size amount of this moisturizer. It reminds me of a gel moisturizer rather than a cream moisturizer. I love that I am able to do a full face of makeup and not feel greasy or shiny. I would recommend this product to anyone in their 20’s that have normal/acne prone skin. I have normal skin and this moisturizer has not made me break out. I will definitely keep buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer, but very light and thin compared to most
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer for the effects its had on my facial complexion, but it took me a while to get used to the consistency. I'm used to a thicker moisturizer, but this one is very light and almost the feel of a thick serum. Love all DE products, and love this, but I might get my LaLa moisturizer again and mix the two. The Protini does do wonders for brightening and tightening the skin! I just like a thicker base
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Cream Ever
customer_reviews.text: I need a face cream that doesn’t make my eyes water. This is a vegan cream that I originally got at Sephora as a sample. I liked it so much then I found it here, and bought the big jar. My eyes don’t weep any more. And it’s really good on your skin. It’s tightening my skin. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: KKP

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin and I've been on a new acne treatment that makes my skin dryer than a parched wasteland and peeling like a lizard. This polypeptide cream has turned my sandpaper face into the smoothest and softest it's ever been. I've been applying it morning and night and my skin has never been better. No more weird flaky skin for me!
customer_reviews.author: Velvetwine

customer_reviews.title: DO BOT BUY THIS KNOCKOFF
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fake! I looked at it compared to the one I bought in Sephora, packaging is different, smelled different, the unit was smaller overall than the original and the text on the back was formatted slightly different looking, I WANT MY MONEY BACK!
customer_reviews.author: Emi Rae

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This product is a scam and I should be getting a refund. I started using it about 3 weeks ago, First I started breaking out right away, I though it was the change of moisturizer but it got worst. Then after about 20 uses the product was finish, I do not see how it can be finished based on the size of the container and the times I have used it, but the pump mechanism that it comes in does not pump any more moisturizer. I think its a complete rip off for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: JAVIER M BRITO

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! FALSE ADVERTISING!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!! If I could give it 0 stars I would. You literally get only about 0.25 oz - not the 1.69 oz it says on the container.. absolutely FALSE ADVERTISING! The actual moisturizer is phenomenal but if you're going to spend $70 on it, just get it from DE directly or Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ingredients- amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful! The texture is a combination of a cream and gel, lightweight but very moisturizing and packed with amazing ingredients. Packaging is great for keeping light and air out so product doesn’t degrade. It is a bit pricey but well worth it. Very happy with my purchase and looking forward to trying more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Sad sad sad
customer_reviews.text: *deep sigh* it’s with my sincerest condolences I write to you all today to inform you that this product never made it to my face. The Product had already been opened (Potentially used) so for sanitary reasons I did not use. It was a waste of coins.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Not a full product
customer_reviews.text: This cream is my holy grail. I have purchased this from sephora many times. This one arriving from amazon was not a full container and seemingly expired.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: this is an imitation product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product purchased from Drunk Elephant several months back. I decided to buy it again and figured I would save a few dollars so I purchased it on Amazon. This is NOT the original product and is a scam! I would like a refund please.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grade A quality
customer_reviews.text: Peptides ourselves that talk to each other a communicator if you will and they've done it right with this product I'm really impressed I definitely notice a huge difference in my skin tone and the texture super worth it and one of the better products without a prescription
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: This cream is just wonderful. I love that it is all natural and cruelty free. The ingredients are packed with the best stuff for your skin. Peptides are really good for your skin. I checked Drunk Elephant’s website and this is their official seller. I love the container which pumps out just what you need and keeps your fingers out of the rest so the product doesn’t get contaminated. Love this cream and am going to try some of their other serums as well. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE COSTA

customer_reviews.title: Burned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to all the reviews but it gave me a horrible chemical burn.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This stuff works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible moisturizer and I love the way it’s packaged in a unique measured dispenser to keep you from using too much. It really works! Not greasy or smelly and over time gives skin a soft smooth glow. It is pricey but have to say you get what you pay for and more.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Dried my face out.
customer_reviews.text: After just a few days this product left my skin dry and bumpy. My skin isn’t sensitive so I was really surprised and disappointed. Total waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Your face deserves this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Drunk Elephant and this is my favorite moisturizer, maybe ever! It is rich, but non-greasy. It doesn't take much to thoroughly moisturize face and neck. I am a repeat customer for several years. The seller provides an authentic product and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Scira

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Makes my skin feel like it is stronger and fuller. I'm in my 30s and things have been ya know kinda getting less taut. Adding this a few times a week has turned things around in a noticeable way. Doesn't clog pores or cause any irratation like many rejuvenating products. I'm a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Solid moisturizer but not enough for $
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but I'm a male and probably have a bigger face than most the people buying this. I can maybe get 3 weeks out of the product before it runs out. Comparable clinique products probably last me double that time and are slightly cheaper. Would be nice if they offered more product for the price. Other than that I enjoy the actual product and can see clear results.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Mildly expensive AF, but probably the best moisturizer I have ever bought and used. This was recommended to me by my esthetician and I am so glad I listened to her. It is light and keeps my skin moisturized even in New England winters. I also have bad skin allergies to nuts and oils, so this is one of very few things that works. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CQ

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: Daily user for lift and moisturizing. Wouldn't go without it. It is perfect for my sking.
customer_reviews.author: Oldfarmchick

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The container is sealed so that you cant see the amount of product you're getting. I don't believe it was the amount of ounces stated on the container it ran out very quickly. The product is very expensive for the amount of product you actually receive.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: DE has the best products money can buy. This moisturizer has helped seal in moisture and transform the texture of your skin. For those prone to acne - this won't clog your pores!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: The product I purchased by seller JOHNASEGREST LLC was supposed to be the Drunk Elephant Protini but this PERSON send me FAKE PRODUCT! The packaging was so noticeable plus the cap can be open when twist and if u know drunk elephant really secures products to ensure good quality. And finally the smell too it was soooo identical to Ponds cream😑 and the size was snaller. I was disbelief about at first but now Im just laughing at the fact that someone sales this for a living😂🤷Im writing this so that if you or anyone trys to buy this through here just go to original website for the GOOD QUALITY PRODUCT not imitation.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Tejeda

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: i've never been one to spend a lot on face lotion but this stuff is too good to pass up. I got a trail from Sephora for my birthday gift and haven't stopped since. My face feels so much more smooth and has made my overall skin progress so much! I used to get a weird patch of blemishes on my face and now that i use this once a day/sometimes twice it never pops up!! MAGIC!
customer_reviews.author: William Demmel

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive but a really nice moisturizer in a fun dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: This is overpriced and the peptides don't have that much research backing up their claims aside from being good humectants. That said, this is a nice light moisturizer for daytime and the dispenser is super fun! It's fragrance free and looks nice on my dresser... so I might be sucked into repurchasing after it runs out... Definitely not significantly better than drugstore moisturizers though so don't purchase unless you have money to burn.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: Not the real product. I buy In store all the time and it’s nothing similar
customer_reviews.author: Asia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware - Very tiny product amount
customer_reviews.text: I opened the tub to see why so very little product was in there. The packaging is nice but very unpractical and waste. The big tub gives an illusion of lots of product, but in fact is very little. See photos for yourself
customer_reviews.author: Kate_Leo

customer_reviews.title: If you want smooth, silky skin look no further
customer_reviews.text: So far (been using about 5 days) I love this product! It’s lightweight, and makes your skin feel smooth, not oily at all! I was turned on to this by a friend who swears by it. Hoping it turns into my “cant live without” product also.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa K Banos

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Good  Cream
customer_reviews.text: Good cream, its too expensive for the amount though. No smell, good for sensitive skin!.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Galeano

customer_reviews.title: Worth...every...single...dollar
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer I’ve ever had in my life. Drunk elephant has cracked the code. They figured it out. I love this stuff so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Staci (Johnson) Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer I see such a difference in my skin I was so skeptical for the price but I LOVE it. When you first put it on it seems like it’s going to be heavy but it isn’t
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It’s moisturize my skin perfectly. Actually after microneedling my face it’s a perfect product with natural ingredients what you have to put in your face, so I am not afraid to use it! It’s really moisturizing skin very good and don’t have dry skin in the morning, What usually follows after micro needling.
customer_reviews.author: Nino kheladze

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Although I’m sure it is a good product? It did not work for me as my fave is dry and needs moister. I typically use Khiels and that product does it for my face. I wanted to try something new and for the price I do t think I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This works better than many expensive brands of face cream that I have tried in the past. Just the right amount of moisture and my face actually feels firmer. Many brands claim this, but the Drunk Elephant Polypeptide Cream actually works.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE

customer_reviews.title: How to get a replacement for a defective item
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to get a hold of amazon for weeks. I thought this product was empty and was so disappointed. I told my daughter and the spring in the container that pumps the lotion is broke. This is so frustrating because it was expensive and I have been trying to get a hold of amazon and there is no way to speak to someone. I would like a refund or a new lotion sent at no charge and a response of how this will be taken care of. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer on my 70 year old skin!
customer_reviews.text: East to use, love the pump container. Soaks in fast. No oily residue. Leaves my skin smooth. This is my first jar, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Robbins

customer_reviews.title: A good moisturizer, but is it worth it?
customer_reviews.text: It spreads well, has an airless container, and is very light on the skin and moisturizes well. However, when you look at the $70 price point and compare it to $10 CeraVe, can i say that it is 7 times better than CeraVe? No - maybe like 50% to twice as good. At that point you have to decide if 7x the price is worth it - and if it is, is there a better alternative in this price range?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the product review
customer_reviews.text: I had a mishap with this specific order, the bottle was empty or the pump was broken.. but I live for this moisturizer! I have very sensitive combo skin and this does not make me breakout or be overly oily I love it , however ill be buying only on Sephora website from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love this it is pricey but I recommend it i apply this morning and night and have noticed my skin really moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: Reynalda

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer in a pump action container
customer_reviews.text: Effective, moderately moisturizer. It comes in a pump action container so you are not putting your fingers in the jar to contaminate it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G.

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Cream EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cream. I have used a ton of other Drunk Elephant products but this one is by far my favorite. It doesn’t leave a greasy film, it’s super light weight. This is the only cream I’ve ever used that has reduced fine lines I’ve been fighting for years. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi

customer_reviews.title: Moderately moisturizing, getting grainy was not my expectation.
customer_reviews.text: Light and moisturizing but got a grainy after being on my face, for about two hours. I had to reapply and finally washed it off and put on a different cream. I will attempt to use it again maybe less and add some Hyaluronic acid for more moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE KNOCKOF
customer_reviews.text: This product seems fake, I’ve used this product for a long time and this is not the real product
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Blakeway

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Kept me moisturized in the cold Alaska. I like that it doesn’t smell anything,light.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!! Not worthing $68 at all!!! Have no reason why it’s so expensive.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the first time for me to try Drunk elephant. I also saw the ad like winning allure award so I decided to buy it for a trial. As a moisturizer, it doesn’t moisturize well. My skin is sensitive, and I tried it for a week to adapt but my face is getting drier and skin is peeling more uneven. If you think you have enough money or your skin is too good, you shall buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jen CZ

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday. Cannot give review one way or another.
customer_reviews.author: bjgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, very moisturizing; a bit expensive; but I do keep buying it
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin more dry
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it the first few days but now it seems to dry my skin out more
customer_reviews.author: Allison Dagenais

customer_reviews.title: creamy.nice
customer_reviews.text: I do like this cream vey much absorbs well so I will order that again .r
customer_reviews.author: Elsebeth Eskesen

customer_reviews.title: Lasts On Skin
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer for the face! I'm in my 50's and have used many creams and moisturizers over the years, this is definitely one of my favorites. Goes on smooth and stays on even into the morning. Can't wait to try their other products!!
customer_reviews.author: rebeca A.

customer_reviews.title: 🐘🐘
customer_reviews.text: I used Kiehls for years (20+) & wanted to try something new. This product did not disappoint, I hope they make a formula with sunscreen soon !
customer_reviews.author: CarterRizzo

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer but still makes me break out a little
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but there is something in it that still irritates my skin. I can manage it by putting on moisturizer once every 2 days instead of every day, however, I'm getting old, so will be looking for a moisturizer I can put on at least every night.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Drunk Elephant is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love Drunk Elephant and specifically this moisturizer. It’s the only moisturizer (truly) that doesn’t feel oily or make my face breakout. Thank you for making this product! I am a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Katie & Jim

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: The pump stopped working after 2 weeks, leaving so much moisturizer inside! Even when I press down nothing comes out. This is unacceptable for a $70 moisturizer!
customer_reviews.author: NSM

customer_reviews.title: Nice moisturizer but it won’t last longer than 7 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Nice moisturizer but it was finished in 7 weeks! On top of that, you can’t twist the lid off to get the precious last amount out. Not sure if this is a defective product. It should last longer than 7 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been spoiled with this! My skin has never thanked me so much!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Snider

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real product. I've bought from Sephora for two years. The packaging colors don't match, the scent is wrong, it's too thick and it doesn't come out of the push mechanism smoothly the way the real thing does. It might be a fine cream but it isn't drunk elephant
customer_reviews.author: Martha Funston

customer_reviews.title: Best packaging
customer_reviews.text: Best product on the market with great packaging. I’m able to use the same amount everyday since it always dispenses the same amount of cream.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: This goes on weird but once dry it’s awesome and I don’t even realize I have it on my face. Works wonders
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Matejcic

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Best brand and product! Works like a charm face feels great
customer_reviews.author: Elin Mardirosian

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Extremely moisturizing, couldn’t figure out how to dispense it for a good 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sidra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizing Facial Cream
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this product as a free sample from Sephora, and I loved it! I noticed the difference in my skin within days of using it! It's unscented and it's very moisturizing to the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke out in hives!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product, as it was my first big purchase for skin care, but my face broke out in hives after just a few uses and it is very painful. I can't believe I spent nearly $70 on a product that destroyed my skin!
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: All the moisture without being greasy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this moisturizer. I have very sensitive skin and this provides moisture without causing breakouts. My skin looked brighter and firmer after using it along with my other DE products.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Burke

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, it seems to be a good moisturizer and would buy again if it were a little less expensive. So far I’ve had it a couple days and haven’t had any significant differences.
customer_reviews.author: Tali

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer but sometimes a little greasy. It’s perfect when I use it when my skin is really dry (I.e. winter time). if I use it everyday I start to break out.
customer_reviews.author: Bobosugs

customer_reviews.title: Very good skin product
customer_reviews.text: Rosecsa .... it helps with redness. You can't cure the disease but it does make it look and feel better. I have purchased before and will continue in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream. I had gotten a sample at Sephora's. It really good. Its part of my morning and evening ritual.
customer_reviews.author: C-Tay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Been using 2 months really have not noticed any changes
customer_reviews.author: Ver

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money honestly! I got the Neutrogrena hydro boost moisturizer for literally $15 and loved it so much more!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The delivery was early! Color me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff for my dry skin. Does not break me out at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this when I received a sample in the mail and fell in love with this product!! Feels light and amazing! Is not heavy or greasy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: lorrie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My wife really loves this. It's one of those things she can't live without.
customer_reviews.author: TDEECV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic daytime moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Love the texture of this product and the lack of a heavy scent! Soaks into my skin beautifully, resulting in a hydrated fresh look. Very anxious to try more products.
customer_reviews.author: cristina fiorenza

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a tub. Annoying dispense though
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturising and I see a noticeable decrease in fine lines (I’m 38)
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Provides the moisture I needed, it’s not overbearing. It’s a little heavy, so I make sure to only apply a small amount. Overall, I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adelita

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Issue, one month after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Super unhappy that the spring broke on this one month after I bought it, and I can no longer get the moisturizer out of the bottle. Waste of $70.
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it moisturizes well and works really great for the price. Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Effective non-oily moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: This cream is light, non-oily and really good for sensitive skin. It only requires a small amount to moisturize my face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Porter

customer_reviews.title: Best product line
customer_reviews.text: Best products! Never had a problem w the product through Amazon. Always gotten the same from them as in the DE website itself.
customer_reviews.author: Sic

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: First tried at Sephora and fell in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: High-quality face cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is amazing. It’s made with clean ingredients, which is great because it goes on your face!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! The first moisturizer that leaves my face hydrated but never greasy. Drunk Elephant is boss.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Theriot

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizer Ever
customer_reviews.text: Good for any type of skin. So glad I finally found something that worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion, but hate how i can’t see how much is left!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Baby Soft Skin!
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin feel and look like a newborn!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: My skin is glowing
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this and every drunk elephant product. It has saved my skin! Moving to Colorado my skin has become so dry and i break out so much, but Since I’ve been using drunk elephant consistently and using this moisturizer my skin is balanced and glowing. Not kidding it is worth the money. I can’t say anything but good things about this whole product line
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Broken container ruined 1/2 my creme.
customer_reviews.text: The plunger stopped pumping cream, although it wasn't clogged, so I naturally thought the container was empty. The weight didn't seem right, so I decided to crack it open and guess what... it was half full! I almost threw out $30 work of cream because of faulty manufacturing. So now I have cream with plastic shards in it and cannot close the top airtight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lotion is too light for my dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: This lotion doesn't moisturize my skin as I'd like. I have very dry skin and this lotion is very light. My skin still feels dry after application. I'd like to return product.
customer_reviews.author: SMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this moisturizer for oily skin. I struggle with congestion and many moisturizers I've tried have clogged my pores. This product leaves my skin moisturized and nourished without any greasy residue or breakouts the next day. I've been using it for about 4 months now and really do see a difference in the smoothness and feel of my skin. I will absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: amberly

customer_reviews.title: Love this Brand
customer_reviews.text: I use Protini along with the Jelly Face Wash and my skin has never been so clear and soft! This moisturizer is so light weight, not oily at all. I’ve dealt with adult acne for years but now I’m thinking it’s because the cheap drug store cleansers and moisturizers abused my skin. Definitely hesitated buying from this company due to the price, but it’s SO worth it! A little bit goes a long way. No smell or dyes used in this moisturizer either.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah62

customer_reviews.title: Dries out face
customer_reviews.text: This product has dried out my face more than anything. Been peeling around the nose since I started using it. Have given it a chance for a month. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough about this face cream!
customer_reviews.text: Drunk Elephant Protini Polypeptide Cream is by far the best face cream I've ever used. It feels luxurious going on to the skin, and it's both healing and anti-aging. I honestly can't say enough about how much I love this face cream!
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTHES SKIN TO EXFOLIATE, MOISTURIZE AND REMOVE MILD BLEMISHES
customer_reviews.text: Drunk Elephant skin products work well on my skin. I am a senior citizen with teen-age bumps and blackheads. Other well known skin care products worked initially but not consistently. This moisturizer has properties to smooth out your skin as well as remove light blemishes and blackheads. I use this moisturizer with Drunk Elephant Vitamin B serum. Good results by itself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wright

product_meta.title: Drunk Elephant Protini Polypeptide Cream. Protein Face Moisturizer with Amino Acids. 50 Milliliters/ 1.69 Ounce.
product_meta.description:
THE DRUNK ELEPHANT DIFFERENCE
With a mission to deliver clinically-effective, clean skincare products formulated with both cutting-edge synthetic and natural ingredients, Drunk Elephant knows that every ingredient should directly benefit the health of your skin or the safety of the formulation. 

 PROTINI POLYPEPTIDE CREAM
Think of Protini in your Drunk Elephant skincare routine like adding a shot of protein to your smoothie. Abundant with proteins and nutrients, it replenishes and restores your skin back to a strong, healthy state. Protini is formulated at the ideal pH level of 4.0. Apply morning and night to clean, dry skin for a vital dose of protein and replenishing moisture the skin needs to retain its youthful appearance. 

 NO FRAGRANCE
After carefully balancing the best ingredients available, Drunk Elephant doesn’t have to add anything to mask their natural scents. When you smell their products, you will likely detect nothing but a glycerin base with slight hints of Marula oil, Zinc Oxide, Thermal Mud, Fruit Enzymes, and Vitamins for a refreshing and reassuring scent. 

 BREAK THE CYCLE
Your skin is left vulnerable with the overuse of harsh exfoliates, chemical peels, expensive laser treatments, Botox abuse, layered foundations and powders, and chemically-laden beauty creams. There’s nothing wrong with an occasional beneficial beauty splurge here and there (when appropriate), but it can be a vicious cycle that is hard to stop. 

 COMMITTED TO CLEAN
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only clean ingredients that either directly benefit the skin’s health, or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulas. You’ll never find the “Suspicious 6” (Essential Oils, Drying Alcohols, Silicones, Chemical Screens, Fragrances/Dyes and SLS) in their products.
feature_bullets: PROTINI POLYPEPTIDE CREAM. This breakthrough protein moisturizer combines signal peptides, growth factors, supportive amino acids and pygmy waterlily for visible and immediate improvement in the appearance of skin’s tone, texture and firmness.

WHAT IT IS FORMULATED TO DO. Protini’s proprietary formula delivers younger, revived-looking skin, almost from the first application. Lines, wrinkles and signs of sun-damage appear reduced; depleted skin feels strengthened and moisturized.

NO QUESTION IN QUALITY. A routine is only as good as its worst product, and a product is only as good as its worst ingredient. Drunk Elephant is dedicated to your internal health and external skin health; "If there's any DOUBT, it's OUT.”

SENSITIVE VS. SENSITIZED. When skin is exposed to irritants and sensitizers, damage can be imperceptible and cumulative, leaving it in a reactive mode. "Sensitive" skin is often just skin that has become sensitized over time by harsh additives

MADE IN THE USA. Drunk Elephant doesn’t take shortcuts or compromise ingredients to save money. They are hands-on and will stay true to their ethos. Their products are designed, tested, and made in the United States. Drunk Elephant is certified cruelty-free, they have never, nor will ever, animal test or allow products to be tested on animals.
